title: Cuticle Oil Rose Scent
description: Floral notes paired with vitamin E, almond, and jojoba oil create a moisturizing, softening, and luxurious blend that will leave your skin soft, hydrated, and sweetly scented of roses.

title: Cuticle Oil Lavender Scent
description: The sweet scent of lavender will give a soothing effect on the skin and nails. The relaxing lavender oil will moisturize the cuticle and help restore the natural flexibility of the nail.

title: Cuticle Oil Natural Scent
description: The distinctive combination of Sweet Almond oil and Jojoba oils seal in moisture and aid in rehydrating and revitalizing cuticles and nails after a manicure.

title: O.P.I Cuticle Oil
description: Includes rich yet lightweight grape seed, sesame, kukui, sunflower & cupua√ßu oils that provide the ultimate in moisture.
